HOME.text_intro: ISMR Query Tool is a web software that aims to extend the possibilities of analyzing ionosphere monitoring data through the application of visualization and data mining techniques, exploring resources in a visual analytic cycle. The software can also be used to download historical tracking data (files.ismr).
HOME.text_ismr_mobile: ISMR Query Tool Mobile was developed with the same purpose as ISMR Query Tool but aiming at portability, making its use in mobile phones and tablets faster and more efficient.
HOME.text_base: The integrated database consists of an effort to concentrate monitoring data from different networks of stations in a single repository. Currently, data from the CIGALA/CALIBRA, ICEA and LISN are available.
